San Francisco, CA

ClickTime (http://www.clicktime.com)

I've been an engineer at ClickTime for the past 4 years. I am hard-pressed to condense all the reasons I love coming to work every day in just a few sentences, but here goes. With only a few engineers, we've managed to create one of the most beautiful, durable, time tracking interfaces out there, and we've done it in a way that we're proud of.

And I get to work with an extremely talented, passionate group of people.

Come join us. We're looking for a generalist who can work all across the board and a back-end engineer:
